name: An exquisite platinum diadem with sapphires
data: It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It increases the users charisma impressively.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a good amount.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
